abstract: Radosav "Raća" Petrović (Serbian Cyrillic: Радосав "Раћа" Петровић) (born 8 March 1989) is a Serbian footballer who plays for Turkish Süper Lig club Gençlerbirliği, as a midfielder. He represented Serbia at the 2010 FIFA World Cup.
comment: Radosav "Raća" Petrović (Serbian Cyrillic: Радосав "Раћа" Петровић) (born 8 March 1989) is a Serbian footballer who plays for Turkish Süper Lig club Gençlerbirliği, as a midfielder. He represented Serbia at the 2010 FIFA World Cup.
name: Petrovic, Radosav
